website_summaries.verdict: The best deal available if you are looking for high-end bocce balls – they have all the features serious players like for optimal performance.
pros: The balls feel weighty and well made
Owners say they are rugged and hold up through serious play
Set meets criteria for professional use
cons: Otherwise, there are few issues with this quality set

customer_reviews.title: These are not made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: After researching the Amazon reviews and internet I found the St Pierre company which advertised their Bocce Balls as Made in the USA. However, when my "Professional" Bocce set arrived it clearly states Made in China. That is not disclosed on Amazon and certainly not mentioned on the Company's web site. In fact, it turns out you can't buy the Chinese made balls from St Pierre. Also the Amazon seller ships this set directly from Over Stock (which offers the same set a few dollars cheaper with free shipping) So they are simply marking up the price and placing your order with Over Stock!)
customer_reviews.author: wscracer

customer_reviews.title: Not regulation size or weight.
customer_reviews.text: After debating for quite some time over which set I should purchase, we decided on the St. Pierre Sports Professional set. We recently joined a Bocce league and thought it would be good to buy a set & practice. We immediately went out with friends to play. Another group arrived and asked if we purchased the "senior" version because the balls were larger & lighter than the ones used for the professional league. I can't tell you how disappointed everyone was. Why do you state "Professional" if these are not league regulation?
customer_reviews.author: Kbarri

customer_reviews.title: Expensive , badly scratched on first throw!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband after laying DG in the garden. We followed Amazon recommendations and spent more money as we wanted them to be used on the hard surface with a good finish that would not scratch. Also, a bag that was strong enough to hold the balls; all problems that were noted on cheaper products. The balls scratched badly on 1st throw and without the cardboard box to hold the balls , the bag is floppy, Never follow Amazon recommends again
customer_reviews.author: Annette M. Flower

customer_reviews.title: Not Regulation - Don’t Buy - Beware
customer_reviews.text: Very deceptive. This is not regulation size and weight. If you don’t want a regulation set this is for you. You can however get non regulation sets much cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Russ B.

customer_reviews.title: great set
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this set and with hte St Johns customer service. I received the set and all the bocce balls were in great condition - they are a traditional colors, perfect weight, nicely made and run true. I did have a problem -- the jack was missing. I contacted the seller and they immediately responded and over-nighted a jack to our home. I gave this set a 5-star rating for the overall quality of the set and importantly for the excellent customer service. Since the set is new I really could not easily assess its durability however given the 'feel' am confident it will be a 4+.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bocce set is the best choice weather you are shopping on line or at ...
customer_reviews.text: This bocce set is the best choice weather you are shopping on line or at a sporting goods store. The eight balls are made of solid resin and feel substantially weighted. The green and red colors have a deeper gloss than other sets I have seen. Instructions are included with the set. Most others did not inlcude game rules. The black carry bag has the logo embroidered on the front and on the handle closures. I am very happy that I chose the St. Pierre Bocce set..and they are made in the USA!!!
customer_reviews.author: StarGazer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bocce Set
customer_reviews.text: Our community has a bocce court but with the pandemic, we decided to purchase our own set of balls so that we had them anytime we wanted to play. These are actually better than the ones our community owns. Regulation size and weight. Love playing with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Valente

customer_reviews.title: Great set but can you buy spare/replacement
customer_reviews.text: Great set of bocce balls for lawn and beach play. We don't play on a court and didn't need professional but wanted regulation size and weight. I recommend them for both price point and quality. Trying to figure out how to get a spare as we tosed one into the Koi pond and can't find it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Lazarowicz

customer_reviews.title: Professional size and weight
customer_reviews.text: Excellent durability, professional size and shape. Having a great time playing bocce ball.
customer_reviews.author: pattirest

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Italians in our family!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the husband for Father's Day...and he is a hard-to-please Italian. We used them casually, on a friend's lawn, and it was so​ much fun! Nice weight and colors. The polina is a bit big--and yellow--which is strange. Overall we love it.
customer_reviews.author: ronit

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after being introduced to the game by friends. Really happy with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Grabs2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Great quality regulation bocce balls! Love the carry case, too. Kept cardboard box inside to line & support carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy feel.
customer_reviews.text: They arrived quickly and have a great feel to them. My bocce court will be built on Tuesday so I’ll add more notes once I’ve actually used them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Family Time Ever!
customer_reviews.text: So far we're very happy with our purchase. Having an amazing time.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Harper

customer_reviews.title: Great tournament balls.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our park Bocce league. We have 22 teams and each team plays 10 games. Everyone loves these balls. Good action, the brighter red is really great. Quality certainly seems to be there and we are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: easy cooking

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They sure are attractive, but as to using them, I have not had an opportunity to use them.
customer_reviews.author: keb

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Very well made, appropriate size and weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to like? What you see is what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Quality. Will last for years.
customer_reviews.text: These Bocci Balls were a big hit as Christmas gifts. This set has good heft. The bag is sturdy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Quality balls
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Authentic Bocce set with quality balls.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Farris

customer_reviews.title: High quality Bocce Balls
customer_reviews.text: Top quality product, made to International specifications. This is a quality product that will meet or exceed your expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jules Westphalen

customer_reviews.title: Just As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product was as advertised and in perfect condition when delivered
customer_reviews.author: zach

customer_reviews.title: They are very nice to use
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice to use. Love the weight and how durable they are. They do get scuffed up when playing but it does not effect performance. Great longevity so far this past year for I use them often and I did not want to have they break.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set - love the yellow ball rather than typical white
customer_reviews.author: sgmabmpgm

customer_reviews.title: Set is missing Pollino Ball
customer_reviews.text: Loved the standard (and perfect!) 8 balls and case, but it's missing the smaller pollino ball. We will return this used set and replace it with a new one. Disappointed, which is rare when dealing with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Scuffed on first play
customer_reviews.text: I took the description to mean that these were sturdy and durable balls- better than the average set. These scuffed quite significantly on first play. if that's the case, buy a cheapo set instead! this is a waste.
customer_reviews.author: ada sof

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: The St. Pierre Sports Professional Bocce Set appears to be of decent quality. I measured the bocce balls at 107mm in diameter. Most weigh 32.5 oz. (921 g.) The lightest ball was 31.7 oz. (899 g.) *See images for actual weights* The case is a bit flimsy: it would benefit from thicker and more rigid padding on the bottom and sides. The zipper is far too light for the case, especially considering the overall weight of the set. It's made in China, not the U.S. Overall, I would recommend the set.
customer_reviews.author: ToolNut

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Besides the crappy bag, this set is great! Was a gift, and used a full day at the beach, they still look new! You will love this set, great value!
customer_reviews.author: SWFL

product_meta.title: St Pierre Sports Professional Bocce Set, Green/Maroon, 107mm
product_meta.description: High quality, all-resin 107mm bocce balls and 60mm pallino. Balls are made of solid resin throughout for consistent balance and durability. Outfit comes in a 600D nylon carry bag with embroidered logo. Balls are manufactured to Bocce Tournament Grade Standards. Sets come with 8 solid bocce balls stripped for 2 or 4 players, 1 jack ball, official rulebook in a durable 600D nylon carry bag.
feature_bullets: Ideal for Backyards, Beaches, Serious Competitors, and Leagues
Included components: 8 solid 107mm bocce balls stripped for 2 or 4 players, 1 60mm jack ball, official rulebook in a durable 600D nylon carry bag.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
